name: MOSQUITO HIGHWAY USA
description:
You're a young, nerdy individual, and before tonight, you were human. After escaping from a Sabbat Mass Embrace, you are given a deal by the Sheriff: 

Help him defend a Camarilla truck stop from an attack prophesized by the Malkavian Primogen, and he will help find you a place in Kindred society.

With five endings, over 28k words, and a romance option, MOSQUITO HIGHWAY USA is a highly-interactive story about a bunch of angsty queer vampires trying to get along.
